title: Wealth for all Africans: How Every African Can Live the Life of Their Dreams
description: Wealth for All Africans is a powerful call to action that takes you on a journey through self-discovery, self-improvement, and self-empowerment. To build and manage your wealth, you must look at your situation holistically: build your character, standards, dreams, goals, and personal aspirations from the inside out. By developing both self-sufficiency and a connection with your community, it is possible to create wealth for yourself no matter who you are, what you do, or where you come from.
author: Idowu Koyenikan
